item.title: Orchestration using GKE
item.description: Google Kubernetes Engine by GCP Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications A container is a basic building block in Kubernetes. Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) a managed service for running Kubernetes, with key features such as security, scaling and multi-cluster support. Note: While exploring GKE, keep a tab on billing (check every so often)! What we will Study Kubernetes on Desktop Use GKE (Google Kubernetes Engine) on GCP for deploying the recommendation system
